appDescription.message: Copy URLs in 5 preset formats with customizable order and visibility. Completely FREE with no additional charges required.

presetCopied.description: Success message when preset is copied

presetNotApplicable.description: Message when preset is not applicable

presetError.description: Error message when preset execution fails

presetSettingsSaved.description: Success message when preset settings are saved

presetTitleUrlNewline.description: Preset name for title and URL with newline

presetTitleUrlSpace.description: Preset name for title and URL with space

presetSelectedTextFormat.description: Preset name for selected text format

presetManagementDescription.message: Change the display order of presets and toggle visibility on/off.
presetManagementDescription.description: Description text in preset management modal
